info.title: Task Management System API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Task Management System including User, Task, Notification, and Organization services

get.summary: List all users across platform (super admin only)

post.summary: Login user and return JWT token
Accept an invite using token to complete registration
Register a new organization with admin user (public)

get.summary: Get organization details (org admin or super admin)

delete.summary: Remove member from organization (org admin or super admin)

post.summary: Admin force reset password (generates new temp password)

get.summary: List invites for an organization (org-admin or global admin)

post.summary: Invite a user to an organization (org-admin only)
Set security questions (required on first login)

get.summary: Get tasks assigned to a user

UserServiceCreateOrganizationMemberBody.title: Create organization member request (admin creates user directly)

newPassword.title: Set permanent password after security questions

newTempPassword.title: Admin sees this to share with user

oneTimePassword.title: Admin sees this once to share with user

userGetOrganizationResponse.title: Get organization response (reuses existing Organization message)

teamName.title: If member belongs to a team

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
